thread.title: Very good, very well managed hotel; good location; superb breakfast
thread.title_full: Very good, very well managed hotel; good location; superb breakfast - Review of Barocco Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Roland V
title: Very good, very well managed hotel; good location; superb breakfast
text: I stayed here for a whole week and agree with the tripadvisor consensus: this is a very good hotel staffed and managed very well by very friendly people. Nice room, comfortable bed, large bathroom, good wi-fi in room. Superb breakfast (including egg dishes, yogurt, cereals, fruits, juices, pastries, sausage, etc., even smoked salmon). Nice location in upscale but very urban neighborhood, very close to subway station (Piazza Barberini, two stops from the Termini railway station) and 5-20 minutes walking distance from major tourist attractions. I received excellent restaurant recommendations. My five stars mean: 100% satisfaction.
